Title: I will write a quality, well researched SEO travel blog
Description:
What can I do for you?
I specialise in travel writing (I work in marketing for a travel company), particularly guides, blogs and articles related to destinations around the world. I can create content for your website, with a focus on Search Engine Optimisation, helping to drive traffic to your site and customers to your business.
I have more than five years experience in content marketing in the travel industry and a good deal of travel experience myself. Some of the countries I have visited include Vietnam, Egypt, Peru, Jordan, the USA, Estonia, Turkey, Hungary, Greece, Italy and Spain, plus many more! My articles are professionally written, spell-checked, fact-checked and 100% original. I do all of the work myself and am happy to write about whichever destination or attraction you would like me to focus on.
Just send me an outline of what you want your blog / article to be about (e.g. 10 reasons to visit Morocco) and a word count, along with anything specific you want included, including any SEO keywords you would like me to include. I write all of my articles in Microsoft Word unless otherwise arranged.
Don't hesitate to contact me before placing an order!

Title: I will create a responsive astro js website with tailwind CSS and SEO optimization
Description:
I'm a skilled web developer with expertise in Astro.js (https://astro.build/) and Tailwind CSS, two cutting-edge technologies that allow me to create amazing websites with ease. Whether you need a personal blog, a business website, or an online portfolio, I can create a custom design that fits your needs and preferences.
Here's what you'll get with this gig:
A fully customized website design that reflects your brand identity and goals
A mobile-friendly and responsive layout that looks great on all devices
Fast-loading and optimized pages that improve user experience and SEO rankings
Additional integration with your preferred CMS, such as Sanity or Strapi
Use of Astro.js to create a static, blazing-fast website that loads instantly
Use of Tailwind CSS to create a beautiful, responsive, and scalable design system
Clean and semantic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code that's easy to maintain and extend
Customized animations and interactions that enhance the user experience
Ongoing support and revisions until you're satisfied with the final result
To get started, all you need to do is provide me with your project requirements, goals, and any branding guidelines or inspiration you may have.
